name: The Prisoner (DEMO)
description:
You play as a prisoner, who (after murdering an old woman), is set loose into the depths of Ironstate Penitentiary, home to the most foul, rich, and built. Can you find your way out of the prison, and back home to your house? Who will you befriend on the inside? All will be revealed...

This game is currently a demo, and I intend on continuing the game in my spare time.
